project.description:
This project introduces the separation between: + structure: HTML + presentation: CSS
index.html : The main page for Starbuzz coffee. Apart from the basic structure it includes some basic CSS style embedded in the head section using the style tag. The style only applies to the body, and sets the following presentation options: + background color + margin to the left and right + dotted border for the page contents + some pixel padding to add a few pixel margin to that border + a sans-serif font
